about_the_game:
Thank You for Considering the 'Supporter DLC' for The Showdown Effect: Reloaded

DLC Features & Benefits:

Show Your Support

By purchasing this DLC, you're expressing your appreciation for The Showdown Effect: Reloaded. We thank you for your commitment to this game! You will get a special tag on the main menu and launcher showing that you are a valued supporter of The Showdown Effect: Reloaded.

Quick Start

You will receive an additional 25,000 AC when next starting the game. This is enough to purchase all characters in the game!

Help Keep the Game Running

Your contribution assists in covering the ongoing operational costs to keep The Showdown Effect: Reloaded running optimally for all players!

Bonus Features

You will gain access to the ability to try out beta releases of The Showdown Effect: Reloaded. We are looking for additional bonus' to give to supporters. If you are a supporter and have an idea, let us know in the #support discord channel!

Special Discord Role

As a token of our gratitude, you will receive a special role in our Discord community, which will also allow access to special supporter-only channels. To claim your role, please complete the following steps:

1. Verify Your Purchase: After purchasing the DLC, get a proof of purchase (through a screenshot or otherwise).
2. Join Our Discord: If you haven't already, join the The Showdown Effect: Reloaded official Discord server.
3. Post Your Proof: Navigate to the specific channel dedicated to DLC verification (#supporter-verification) and post your proof of purchase.
4. Receive Your Role: Once verified, you will be granted the special supporter role, distinguishing you as a key contributor to the game's ongoing success!
